item.title: Lex Fridman: How to learn and master a new skill简评
item.description: 视频地址：How to learn and master a new skill 视频原文 Lex Fridman: How to learn and master a new skill First question is you’ve reached a high level of ability slash expertise in a number of fields martial arts, ai, music etc. I’m curious to know how you think about the learning process when juggling all of these things. It takes
